Generation VI.X: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
Generation VI.Y: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

Generation VIII.Sword: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn't get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
Generation VIII.Shield: The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes Swirlix's fluffy fur. This Pokémon spits out sticky string to tangle up its enemies.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 5 , Glimwood Tangle , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness Rolling Fields , Bridge Field , Hammerlocke Hills , Lake of Outrage ( Max Raid Battle )
